etymology.interpretation: A Mandarin rendering of the English/French city name Montreal, chosen to approximate its pronunciation. Characters are selected for sound rather than meaning.
etymology.simplification: 尔 is the simplified form of 爾; Mainland usage standardizes 尔 for the -ěr sound in transliterations to reduce strokes.

examples.chinese: 我去年去过蒙特利尔(我去年去過蒙特利爾)。
蒙特利尔的冬天很冷(蒙特利爾的冬天很冷)。
examples.english: Winters in Montreal are very cold.

examples.chinese: 她来自蒙特利尔(她來自蒙特利爾)。
